name: Ashe's Generic Speedrun Platformer
description:
A small Platformer I challenged myself to make in a week and a few days while on vacation. Its meant as a quick, speedrun sort of platformer. Jump and Dash through levels to get the lowest time you can

tilde to fullscreen

Note: I don't know how well this will work on linux or mac, It also wasnt made to be played in browser but hope it feels fine either way.

Copywrite Free Music: Stardust - JSH
